casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, v. Mark SWIDA, Appellant. No. 02-1449. United States Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Submitted Sept. 23, 2002. Decided Oct. 24, 2002.

Before BARRY, AMBRO and COWEN, Circuit Judges.

OPINION

PER CURIAM.

Por essentially the reasons set forth in Judge Vanaskie’s memorandum opinion dated January 15, 2001, we affirm the District Court’s judgment.
